content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production at (-18.0, -53.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-18.0, -53.0) with drop position (-17.5, -51.5)
- Wooden chest at (-17.5, -51.5) containing 9 iron ore
- Drill contains 13 coal
- System status: drill working

### Copper Plate Production at (-21.0, -73.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-21.0, -73.0) with drop position (-20.5, -71.5)
- Wooden chest at (-20.5, -71.5) containing 9 copper ore
- Burner inserter at (-18.5, -70.5) facing LEFT with 4 coal
- Drill contains 12 coal
- System status: drill working, inserter waiting for source items

### Power Generation System
Consists of:
- Steam engine at (-14.5, 15.5) facing UP
- Boiler at (-14.5, 19.0) (currently out of fuel)
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, 24.5)
- Multiple pipe groups connecting components
- Electric pole network connecting broader system
System status:
- Steam engine not receiving electricity
- Boiler out of fuel but contains water
- Offshore pump working

### Research Facility
- Lab at (10.5, 0.5) containing 15 automation science packs
- Currently researching logistics technology
- No power due to steam engine issues

ERROR TIPS

### Recipe and Crafting Issues
- Even after research is completed, recipes need to be enabled before crafting
- Check if recipe is enabled before attempting to craft (wooden chest, iron gear wheel)
- Verify required ingredients are available before crafting

### Entity Placement Issues
- Cannot place transport belts without having them in inventory
- Ensure proper spacing when placing entities at drill output positions

### Resource Collection Issues
- When extracting from chests or drills, ensure you are at the correct position
- Verify the target entity actually contains the resource you're trying to extract
- Check chest contents before attempting extraction

### Resource Management
- Monitor coal levels in all fuel-consuming entities (boiler, drills, inserters)
- Ensure sufficient coal is collected before attempting to refuel entities
- Keep track of wood supply for wooden chest crafting

### Power System Issues
- Monitor boiler fuel levels to prevent power outages
- Ensure proper fluid connections between power system components
- Address "no input liquid" and "not receiving electricity" warnings

### Automation Setup Issues
- Use proper entity references when working with chests and drills
- Monitor chest inventories to prevent overflow
- Ensure proper connection between automated components

### API Usage Issues
- Handle nil values appropriately in recipe and crafting operations
- Use correct entity references when extracting or inserting items
- Verify entity existence before attempting operations
